archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0849
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Disclosure Manager/Analyst, I want to be able to easily intercept any service connection by way of any identifier given by NZ Law Enforcement Agencies under statutory orders served, ensure that we are able to confirm that the correct individual is being intercepted by NZ Law Enforcement Agencies in conjunction with providing live evidential records to assist in either proving the criminal offending or innocence of customers who are using our services.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
